WorkItem.ClosedComment: This isn't an issue/bug.... If you read the developer documentation, section 4.6.37 ("Reading Images from a worksheet") shows how to do this - https://github.com/PHPOffice/PHPExcel/blob/develop/Documentation/markdown/Overview/08-Recipes.md#reading-images-from-a-worksheet
